spells.name: Beguiling Gift
spells.description: Subject immediately accepts an offered item and uses it.

spells.name: Dancing Lantern
spells.description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

spells.name: Ill Omen
spells.description: Target rolls twice for checks and attacks and uses worst roll.

spells.name: Mask Dweomer
spells.description: Hides presence of a spell from detect magic.
